actions.text: Amendment SA 2255 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 2255 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4189) To extend real-time sound monitoring at Navy installations where tactical fighter aircraft operate.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2255 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2255 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To extend real-time sound monitoring at Navy installations where tactical fighter aircraft operate.
